properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    with mysub
as
(select 'MCHB' as src_tbl_nm
, MCHB.matnr as matl_num
, MCHB.werks as plnt_cd
, MCHB.lgort as sloc_cd
, MCHB.charg as btch_num
, '#' as btch_sts_cd
, '#' as spcl_stck_ind
, '#' as prty_num
, MCHB.clabs as unrstrctd_stck
, MCHB.cumlm in_trnsfr_stck
, MCHB.cinsm as qlty_insp_stck
, MCHB.ceinm as rstrctd_stck
, MCHB.cspem as blckd_stck,
CASE WHEN MCHB.ersda = '00000000' THEN NULL
    WHEN LENGTH(MCHB.ersda) < 8 THEN NULL
    ELSE to_timestamp(MCHB.ersda, \"yyyyMMdd\")
END AS CRT_DTTM,
MCHB.cretm as rtrns,
null as STO_IN_TRNST_QTY,
null as PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY,
NULL AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER,
NULL AS CUR_PER
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.mchb MCHB
where MCHB._deleted_ = 'F'  AND MCHB.MANDT = '020'
UNION ALL
select 'MARD' as src_tbl_nm
, MARD.matnr as matl_num,
MARD.werks as plnt_cd,
MARD.lgort as sloc_cd,
'#' as btch_num,
'#' as btch_sts_cd,
'#' as spcl_stck_ind,
'#' as prty_num,
MARD.labst as unrstrctd_stck,
MARD.umlme as in_trnsfr_stck,
MARD.insme as qlty_insp_stck,
MARD.einme as rstrctd_stck,
MARD.speme as blckd_stck,
CASE WHEN MARD.ersda = '00000000' THEN NULL
    WHEN LENGTH(MARD.ersda) < 8 THEN NULL
    ELSE to_timestamp(MARD.ersda, \"yyyyMMdd\")
END AS CRT_DTTM,
MARD.retme as rtrns,
null as STO_IN_TRNST_QTY,
null as PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY,
NULL AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER,
NULL AS CUR_PER
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.mard MARD
where MARD._deleted_ = 'F' AND MARD.MANDT = '020'
UNION ALL
select 'MSKU' as src_tbl_nm
, MSKU.matnr as matl_num,
MSKU.werks as plnt_cd,
'#' as sloc_cd,
MSKU.charg as btch_num,
'#' as btch_sts_cd,
MSKU.sobkz spcl_stck_ind,
MSKU.kunnr as prty_num,
MSKU.kulab as unrstrctd_stck,
MSKU.kuuml in_trnsfr_stck,
MSKU.kuins as qlty_insp_stck,
MSKU.kuein as rstrctd_stck,
null as blckd_stck,
NULL AS CRT_DTTM,
null as rtrns,
null as STO_IN_TRNST_QTY,
null as PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY,
MSKU.lfgja AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER,
MSKU.lfmon AS CUR_PER
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.msku MSKU
where MSKU._deleted_ = 'F'  AND MSKU.MANDT = '020'
UNION ALL
select 'MSLB' as src_tbl_nm
, MSLB.matnr as matl_num,
MSLB.werks as plnt_cd,
'#' as sloc_cd,
MSLB.charg as btch_num,
'#' as btch_sts_cd,
MSLB.sobkz as spcl_stck_ind,
MSLB.lifnr as prty_num,
MSLB.lblab as unrstrctd_stck,
MSLB.lbuml as in_trnsfr_stck,
MSLB.lbins as qlty_insp_stck,
MSLB.lbein as rstrctd_stck,
null as blckd_stck,
NULL AS CRT_DTTM,
null as rtrns,
null as STO_IN_TRNST_QTY,
null as PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY,
NULL AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER,
NULL AS CUR_PER
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.mslb MSLB
where MSLB._deleted_ = 'F' AND  MSLB.MANDT = '020'
UNION ALL
select 'MKOL' as src_tbl_nm,
 MKOL.matnr  as matl_num,
 MKOL.werks as plnt_cd,
 MKOL.lgort as sloc_cd,
 MKOL.charg as btch_num,
 '#' as btch_sts_cd,
 MKOL.sobkz spcl_stck_ind,
 MKOL.lifnr as prty_num,
 MKOL.slabs as unrstrctd_stck,
 null in_trnsfr_stck,
 MKOL.sinsm as qlty_insp_stck,
 MKOL.seinm as rstrctd_stck,
 MKOL.sspem as blckd_stck,
CASE WHEN MKOL.ersda = '00000000' THEN NULL
    WHEN LENGTH(MKOL.ersda) < 8 THEN NULL
    ELSE to_timestamp(MKOL.ersda, \"yyyyMMdd\")
END AS CRT_DTTM,
null as rtrns,
null as STO_IN_TRNST_QTY,
null as PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY,
NULL AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER,
NULL AS CUR_PER
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.MKOL MKOL
where MKOL._deleted_ = 'F' AND MKOL.MANDT = '020'
UNION ALL
select 'MSSL' as src_tbl_nm
, MSSL.matnr as matl_num,
MSSL.werks as plnt_cd,
'#' as sloc_cd,
'#' as btch_num,
'#' as btch_sts_cd,
MSSL.sobkz spcl_stck_ind,
MSSL.lifnr as prty_num,
MSSL.sllab as unrstrctd_stck,
null as in_trnsfr_stck,
MSSL.slins as qlty_insp_stck,
MSSL.slein as rstrctd_stck,
null as blckd_stck,
NULL AS CRT_DTTM,
null as rtrns,
null as STO_IN_TRNST_QTY,
null as PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY,
NULL AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER,
NULL AS CUR_PER
from {Config.sourceDatabase}.mssl MSSL
where MSSL._deleted_ = 'F' AND  MSSL.MANDT = '020'
)
--select SRC_SYS_CD,SRC_TBL_NM,MATL_NUM,PLNT_CD,SLOC_CD,BTCH_NUM,BTCH_STS_CD,SPCL_STCK_IND,PRTY_NUM, count(*) from (
select
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  AS SRC_SYS_CD
, mysub.src_tbl_nm   as SRC_TBL_NM
, mysub.MATL_NUM     AS MATL_NUM
, mysub.PLNT_CD      AS PLNT_CD
, coalesce(mysub.SLOC_CD,'#')    AS SLOC_CD
, coalesce(mysub.BTCH_NUM,'#')    AS BTCH_NUM
, '#' AS BTCH_STS_CD
, coalesce(mysub.SPCL_STCK_IND,'#')   AS SPCL_STCK_IND
, coalesce(mysub.PRTY_NUM,'#')   AS PRTY_NUM
, cast(mysub.UNRSTRCTD_STCK AS DECIMAL(18,4))  AS UNRSTRCTD_STCK
, cast(mysub.IN_TRNSFR_STCK AS DECIMAL(18,4)) AS IN_TRNSFR_STCK
, cast(mysub.QLTY_INSP_STCK AS DECIMAL(18,4)) AS QLTY_INSP_STCK
, cast(mysub.RSTRCTD_STCK AS DECIMAL(18,4))    AS RSTRCTD_STCK
, cast(mysub.BLCKD_STCK AS DECIMAL(18,4))  AS BLCKD_STCK
, mysub.CRT_DTTM AS CRT_DTTM
, cast(mysub.RTRNS AS DECIMAL(18,4))   AS RTRNS
, MARA.meins  AS BASE_UOM_CD
, null   AS STO_IN_TRNST_QTY
, null   AS PLNT_IN_TRNST_QTY
, cast(mysub.FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER AS int)  AS FISC_YR_OF_CUR_PER
, cast(mysub.CUR_PER AS int)  AS CUR_PER
from mysub mysub
LEFT JOIN {Config.sourceDatabase}.MARA MARA on MARA.MATNR = mysub.MATL_NUM AND MARA._deleted_ = 'F' and MARA.MANDT=\"020\"  
 
""")
